analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: The GMS Score of 44 signals a transition into a Neutral market regime. Strong upward momentum pushed the score from 29 to 44, primarily driven by a 16% collapse in the VIX (Volatility/Fear) and a softening DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity). While tightening credit spreads and rising equities show returning risk appetite, the significant surge in Gold and Silver suggests that defensive hedging remains active. Traders should remain cautious; despite the improving momentum, a sustained breakout above the 50-level is required to confirm a full shift toward a proactive accumulation phase.

reports.EN: The GMS Score of 44 signals a transition into a Neutral market regime. Strong upward momentum pushed the score from 29 to 44, primarily driven by a 16% collapse in the VIX (Volatility/Fear) and a softening DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity). While tightening credit spreads and rising equities show returning risk appetite, the significant surge in Gold and Silver suggests that defensive hedging remains active. Traders should remain cautious; despite the improving momentum, a sustained breakout above the 50-level is required to confirm a full shift toward a proactive accumulation phase.
reports.ES: El GMS de 44 seÃ±ala una transiciÃ³n hacia un rÃ©gimen Neutral. El impulso alcista empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n desde 29, impulsado por una caÃ­da del 16% en el VIX (Volatilidad/Miedo) y un DXY (Fuerza del dÃ³lar) mÃ¡s dÃ©bil. Aunque los diferenciales de crÃ©dito se ajustan y las acciones suben, el repunte del oro y la plata indica que persiste la cobertura defensiva. Se recomienda mantener una postura equilibrada; a pesar de la mejora del impulso, se necesita una ruptura sostenida por encima del nivel 50 para confirmar un cambio total hacia una fase de acumulaciÃ³n activa y segura.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 44 menandakan transisi menuju rezim pasar Netral. Momentum ke atas mendorong skor dari 29 ke 44, terutama dipicu oleh penurunan VIX (Volatilitas/Ketakutan) sebesar 16% dan pelemahan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar/Likuiditas). Meskipun penyempitan spread kredit menunjukkan kembalinya selera risiko, lonjakan signifikan pada emas dan perak mengindikasikan bahwa lindung nilai defensif masih aktif. Investor disarankan untuk tetap waspada; meskipun momentum membaik, penembusan level 50 secara berkelanjutan diperlukan untuk mengonfirmasi pergeseran penuh menuju fase akumulasi yang berisiko.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 44 signalisiert den Ãœbergang in ein neutrales Marktumfeld. Das AufwÃ¤rtsmomentum drÃ¼ckte den Score von 29 auf 44, was vor allem auf den Einbruch des VIX (VolatilitÃ¤t/Angst) um 16 % und einen schwÃ¤cheren DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke) zurÃ¼ckzufÃ¼hren ist. WÃ¤hrend die Verengung der Kreditspreads auf eine RÃ¼ckkehr der Risikofreude hindeutet, mahnt die starke Rallye bei Gold und Silber zur Vorsicht. Anleger sollten eine ausgewogene Strategie verfolgen, bis der Score nachhaltig Ã¼ber die Marke von 50 steigt, um einen echten Wechsel in eine Akkumulationsphase zu bestÃ¤tigen.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 44 signale une transition vers un rÃ©gime de marchÃ© Neutre. Le momentum haussier a poussÃ© le score de 29 Ã  44, principalement soutenu par l'effondrement de 16 % du VIX (VolatilitÃ©/Peur) et un affaiblissement du DXY (Force du dollar). Bien que le resserrement des spreads de crÃ©dit montre un retour de l'appÃ©tit pour le risque, la flambÃ©e de l'or et de l'argent suggÃ¨re que les couvertures dÃ©fensives restent actives. Maintenez une position prudente et diversifiÃ©e tant que le score ne franchit pas durablement le seuil des 50 pour confirmer une phase d'accumulation rÃ©elle.
